- Play ESPN fantasy football, baseball, basketball, hockey, and other games in one place!
- Create a league, join a league, and draft directly in the app-- just a single tap away.
- Snake or auction? Either way it’s the best draft experience we’ve ever offered on phones and tablets.
- If you were any closer to Matthew Berry, Tristan H. Cockcroft, Eric Karabell and Mike Clay you’d be at their Sunday dinner. Access award-winning content from the most trusted source in Fantasy, including video, front and center on the app’s home screen.
- Improved video playback and social sharing are smooth like Odell Beckham Jr. making a one-handed grab.
- Brand new design and visuals, including player headshots, new game logos, sticker packs, and animations.
- Get instantly alerted to news and video relevant to the players on your roster.
- Force Touch support lets you into your team faster than JJ Watt rushing the QB.
- Access other ESPN games like Bowl Mania and Streak for the Cash for a chance to win cash and prizes.

- Increased stability: We fixed a handful of issues that were causing the app to occasionally error out or crash.
- League Manager Poll in Activity & Messages makes it easy to settle debates with your league mates.
- Enhanced video experience within articles gets you the inside scoop from Matthew Berry and the rest of ESPN’s stable of fantasy experts.
- Follow your players' performance live right on the My Team screen and FantasyCast.
- Speed: We made the app faster so you can update your lineup and get your scores even quicker than before.

- Built for iOS10!
- Follow your matchups right from your lock screen with the new fantasy widget.
- Add some fantasy-sports flavor to your iMessage chats with more than 100 ESPN-themed stickers featuring Jon Gruden, Matthew Berry, Herm Edwards and more.
- Matchup Preview: How’s it looking for this week? Preview your upcoming matchup with side-by-side projections for each position.
- Roster News is back with a single feed of breaking news and key insights about the players on your team, accessible from your roster screen.
- Real-time matchup scoring and pro scores have never looked better. FantasyCast for basketball and hockey are redesigned and ready to go for the 2016-17 seasons.
- Injuries hurt, but at least updating your lineup can be painless. Manage DL and IR eligible players directly from the Edit Lineup screen.
- Enhanced player search capabilities make it easier to find free agents.
- We hit the gym with a hardcore routine. The app is faster, stronger, and more responsive.
- There were bugs. We squashed a lot of them.

- Streak, formerly known as Streak for the Cash, is refreshed, re-branded and now playable in the the ESPN Fantasy App alongside your favorite fantasy games!
- Put your sports knowledge to the test and pick the winners of upcoming sporting events for a chance to win prizes.
- Designed for hardcore sports fans and casual fans alike, Streak presents a personalized set of matchups to each fan with new typography and matchup data, as well as fun animations, avatars and emojis related to a player’s “HOT” or “COLD” streaks.

Create a group. Invite your friends. Defeat your friends. Pit your knowledge against theirs and see who can build the longest streak.

[+] Ready for football season? We are too, with a bunch of improvements to help you win your league this year!
[+] We’ve updated how you move around the app, putting the most important screens at your fingertips and showing more of your roster in view as you scroll and manage your team.
[+] Improved video player! Easily browse playlists of clips, double-tap to skip ahead or rewind ten seconds, and easily go back to previous videos.
[+] ESPN+ subscribers can now watch now full episodes of The Fantasy Show, and other great ESPN+ originals, right in the app! Start the stream and let Matthew Berry and his unconventional cast of characters keep you one step ahead of your league-mates all season long.
[+] Bug fixes and performance improvements.
[+] There’s plenty more on the way! Stay tuned for more updates to the app throughout the season.
